data.name: Golden Light - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Want to show your support to Mr. Pink? We have some goodies in store, including:

Unique co-op skin


  • Cool skin for your character that you’ll be able to wear in the co-op mode.

Unique skin for the bicycle


  • Make your creepy bicycle look even weirder!

In-game Soundtrack


  • Experience a full Golden Light Original Soundtrack.

All your favorite tunes, from demonically haunting room themes to boss battles, Snout's tape recorder cassettes and memory washing Memento theme, all in one lovely package which is Golden Light OST: The Meat Song.

Produced by The Gut itself with meat, gold and love.

Tracklist:

1.Golden Light
2. Menu theme
3. Eternal Field
4.Memento
5. She is waiting
6. She's Theme
7. Carre's theme

data.short_description: Unique add-ons that allow you to support developer and get exclusive in-game items!
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 1Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i-5-4000+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 2Gb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains anatomically incorrect nudity and violence
